slides.title: Snippets handling
slides.description: Quick tour to create and use snippets in terminal window

slides.title: Select Snippet
slides.description: ...click on snippet, send it to board.

slides.title: Memory Snippet
slides.description: ...in terminal window, the actual status of is shown.

slides.title: Manage snippets
slides.description:
...click on trash to drop selected snippet.
or enter snippet Name and Snippet itself to add new one

slides.title: Snippets done
slides.description: ...Now that you got a first overview, check the functions by yourself and enjoy.
